landing.title:
Luis Espinoza
IA-Driven Product Engineer
landing.message: AI-Driven Product Engineer with 4+ years creating scalable mobile and web applications. Specialized in React, React Native, and TypeScript, I leverage AI tools like Cursor to deliver innovative solutions in FinTech, EventTech, and automation.

impact.label: Downloads on developed apps
impact.description: Contributed to Pago Fácil development with 1.5M+ downloads and 500K monthly active users.

launches.label: Years in FinTech and EventTech
launches.description: Experience developing in high-demand technical sectors like finance and events.

leadership.label: Main specialty
leadership.description: Native mobile development for iOS and Android with clean architecture and optimized performance.

stack.title: Stack & AI Tools
stack.description: React, React Native, TypeScript, Firebase, AWS, Redux, and Cursor AI for accelerated development. Clean Architecture and AI tools for code, testing, and scalable product optimization.

product.title: Specialized mobile development
product.description: Create robust React Native applications with API integration, authentication, and real-time databases.

delivery.title: AI-accelerated development
delivery.description: Leverage Cursor AI and modern tools to optimize productivity, debugging, and code quality.

partnership.title: Technical collaboration
partnership.description: Work efficiently in multidisciplinary teams, maintain clean code and clear documentation.

skills.title: SKILLS
skills.intro: A strategic operator who keeps vision, engineering and teams in sync. Here is how I create momentum.

product.title: Product discovery & strategy
product.description: Bring clarity to the roadmap before a single line of code.
product.bullets: Frame hypotheses with stakeholders and turn research into prioritised bets.|Define KPI trees, analytics plans and experimentation loops for every release.|Give leadership visibility with concise storytelling and decision docs.

engineering.title: Full-stack engineering craft
engineering.description: Architect resilient, elegant experiences across platforms.
engineering.bullets: Design modular design systems and reusable component libraries.|Apply clean architecture with TypeScript, React, React Native and cloud-native services.|Embed testing, observability and CI/CD so iterations stay predictable.

enablement.title: Team enablement & operations
enablement.description: Build the rituals that keep squads shipping at high velocity.
enablement.bullets: Mentor engineers through pairing, reviews and guild practices.|Optimise agile ceremonies, backlog health and risk mitigation to unblock delivery.|Maintain living documentation and playbooks for distributed teams.

quote.text: Luis orchestrated a seamless FinTech launch—vision, execution and mentorship in one partner.
quote.author: Head of Product — Pago Fácil

ethos.title: ETHOS
ethos.intro: Empathy from philosophy, precision from engineering, and outcomes from relentless iteration.

media.label: Curiosity in practice
media.caption: Always learning—philosophy, systems and craft to match ambition with delivery.
media.alt: Illustration of Luis reading a book

ethos.story: Philosophy taught me to interrogate problems before reaching for solutions.|I design with empathy—writing, sketching and testing to ground product decisions in human context.|I protect craft and delivery by creating transparent rituals, robust instrumentation and trust.

0.description: Partnering with FinTech, SaaS and creative organisations to ship revenue-driving products end-to-end.

1.description: Led mobile and web squads for event platforms, monetisation programs and analytics pipelines.

2.role: Full-stack Engineer · Pago Fácil & Western Union
2.description: Delivered wallet features, payment integrations and growth experiments during hyper-scale adoption.

0.quote: He bridges strategy and execution effortlessly—our roadmap stayed bold while releases stayed calm.
0.author: Product Director — Hybeans

1.quote: Luis built the rituals, tooling and trust we needed to scale without losing quality.
1.author: CTO — FastForm

works.title: WORKS
works.intro: Signature engagements where I combined product strategy, engineering leadership and measurable business impact.

Pago Fácil & Western Union.name: Pago Fácil & Western Union
Pago Fácil & Western Union.description: Principal React Native engineer scaling the Pago Fácil super app with Western Union. Led squads delivering money movement, compliance, rewards and offline flows for millions of users while safeguarding production stability.
Pago Fácil & Western Union.highlights: Orchestrated feature squads to launch high-impact flows across Argentina and Paraguay.|Refactored legacy modules into composable architecture, improving crash-free sessions and release cadence.|Partnered with product, compliance and design to align customer journeys, regulations and analytics.
Pago Fácil & Western Union.result: Impact: 1M+ downloads, 300K+ monthly active users and faster release cycles.

meta.role: Principal React Native engineer & product partner

0-Registros.name: 0-Registros
0-Registros.description: Zero-to-one experimental platform blending poetry, generative visuals and technology. Built a multi-language Next.js experience with p5.js animations and Firebase to support live performances.
0-Registros.highlights: Designed immersive storytelling with adaptive layouts and typographic systems.|Implemented a real-time creative engine combining p5.js scenes with curated writing.|Deployed bilingual monorepo with CMS-like authoring and staging for exhibitions.
0-Registros.result: Impact: Showcased at digital art festivals with seamless uptime during live readings.

Hybeans App.name: Hybeans App
Hybeans App.description: Shipped the flagship mobile experience for Hybeans, an EventTech platform connecting communities before, during and after events.
Hybeans App.highlights: Implemented authentication, social feed, live bookings and in-app commerce across iOS & Android.|Integrated push notifications, deep links and analytics pipelines covering the attendee journey.|Coordinated design, backend and QA to deliver high-traffic releases under tight timelines.
Hybeans App.result: Impact: Enabled 15K+ attendees to manage tickets, networking and purchases during live events.

FastForm.name: Fast Form
FastForm.description: Co-created FastForm, a SaaS platform that automates Google Forms production with AI, imports and manual builders for enterprise teams.
FastForm.highlights: Defined product architecture spanning AI chat, CSV importer, manual builder and draft workflows.|Developed a Next.js 15 app with drag-and-drop UI, metrics dashboard and Google Workspace authentication.|Integrated OpenAI, Google Forms API and MercadoPago billing into cohesive user flows.
FastForm.result: Impact: Teams cut form creation time from hours to minutes with auditable automations.

Push Notify.name: NOUS - Push Notify
Push Notify.description: Built a secure operations console for NOUS to orchestrate mass push notifications across their mobile ecosystem.
Push Notify.highlights: Implemented admin onboarding with service credential management and role-based access.|Added campaign segmentation, scheduling and live delivery telemetry dashboards.|Hardened Firebase Cloud Messaging pipelines with audit-ready logging and monitoring.
Push Notify.result: Impact: Reduced manual push campaigns while keeping GDPR-compliant messaging.

Filoweb.name: Filoweb
Filoweb.description: Designed Filoweb, an educational experience guiding newcomers through the history of philosophy with interactive storytelling.
Filoweb.highlights: Crafted narrative UX with timelines, author journeys and responsive layouts.|Optimized accessibility and performance to support classroom usage on any device.|Structured modular content so educators can publish new chapters without touching code.
Filoweb.result: Impact: Expanded the philosophy program reach to 5K+ readers annually.

Hybeans Web.name: Hybeans Web
Hybeans Web.description: Extended Hybeans to the web with conversion-driven landing pages, booking flows and personalization.
Hybeans Web.highlights: Built booking engine with real-time availability, payment checkout and confirmation flows.|Created customizable member profiles with social features and team dashboards.|Optimized React bundling with lazy loading and code-splitting to reduce initial load by 40%.
Hybeans Web.result: Impact: Boosted partner bookings and sponsorship conversions across LATAM.

AEG Hornos de Cerámica.name: AEG Ceramic Ovens
AEG Hornos de Cerámica.description: Delivered an operations platform for AEG Hornos de Cerámica, unifying marketing site and CRM backoffice for specialized technicians.
AEG Hornos de Cerámica.highlights: Developed CRM with customer segmentation, pricing management and suggestion pipelines.|Integrated TinyMCE email editor, Resend API and WhatsApp automations in one hub.|Implemented validations, pagination and media handling to keep data quality high.
AEG Hornos de Cerámica.result: Impact: Centralized operations and reduced manual follow-ups by 60%.
